items.name: Atar Kicker Kids Field
items.short_description: A vibrant artificial turf pitch perfect for kids to play 5-a-side football. Includes small goals and soft balls for safe, energetic play.
items.address: Rue du Marché Central, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Desert Hoops Basketball Corner
items.short_description: A specially designed outdoor basketball court with child-friendly hoops and padded surfaces. Encourages teamwork and basic basketball skills in a safe environment.
items.address: Near Atar Hospital, Boulevard de la Poste, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Atar Sprint Stars Track
items.short_description: A mini track and field area offering simplified versions of running, long jump, and obstacle courses for young athletes. Designed for fun and skill development.
items.address: Quartier Tleila, Avenue des Martyrs, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Oujoud Mini Tennis Academy
items.short_description: Two scaled-down tennis courts with low nets and soft balls, ideal for children to learn the basics of tennis in a fun, pressure-free environment. Coaching available.
items.address: Avenue de la Liberté, Oujoud, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Desert Explorer Obstacle Course
items.short_description: Navigate a fun and challenging outdoor obstacle course designed for various age groups. Kids can climb, crawl, and balance their way through exciting adventures.
items.address: Route de Chinguetti, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Oasis Treasure Hunt
items.short_description: An interactive outdoor treasure hunt where children follow clues to discover hidden 'gems' and learn about local history. Great for groups and problem-solving skills.
items.address: Parc National du Banc d'Arguin entrance, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Mystic Maze of Atar
items.short_description: A large, child-friendly maze designed with fun twists and turns, featuring interactive puzzles and riddles to solve. Perfect for adventurous minds and physical activity.
items.address: Near Atar Public Library, Rue de la Culture, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Pharaoh's Junior Escape Room
items.short_description: An exciting escape room experience tailored for children, involving ancient Egyptian themes and age-appropriate puzzles. Work together to unlock the secrets!
items.address: Centre Ville, Boulevard de l'Indépendance, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Brick Builders Workshop
items.short_description: A dedicated space filled with thousands of LEGO bricks, allowing children to build anything their imagination desires. Daily building challenges and free play zones.
items.address: Rue du Commerce, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Duplo Desert Oasis
items.short_description: A soft and safe play area specifically designed for toddlers and preschoolers, featuring oversized DUPLO bricks. Encourages early motor skills and creative play.
items.address: Near Atar Museum, Rue de la Culture, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Little Engineers Construction Site
items.short_description: An interactive construction zone where kids can operate mini-diggers, build with large foam blocks, and wear construction helmets. Inspires future builders and engineers.
items.address: Industrial Zone, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Robotics & Gizmos Lab for Kids
items.short_description: A unique space where older children can explore basic robotics and simple machine building using various construction kits. Guided workshops foster STEM skills.
items.address: Atar Tech Hub, Avenue de la République, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Desert Friends Character Zone
items.short_description: Meet and greet beloved local and international cartoon characters. Perfect for photo opportunities and creating magical memories with your child's favorite heroes.
items.address: Atar City Square, Place de la Justice, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Atar Animation Parade
items.short_description: A dazzling parade featuring colorful cartoon characters dancing and interacting with the crowd. Kids can wave and cheer as their favorite cartoons pass by.
items.address: Along Avenue Chinguetti, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Story Time with Super Sami
items.short_description: Join 'Super Sami' and his cartoon friends for an engaging storytelling session. Children will be captivated by exciting tales and moral lessons.
items.address: Atar Cultural Center, Rue de la Paix, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Selfie Station with Kooky Kameleon
items.short_description: Strike a pose and get a memorable selfie with Kooky Kameleon and other vibrant cartoon characters. A fun way to capture the magic of your visit!
items.address: Atar Family Fun Zone, Route de l'Aéroport, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Princess Palace of Adrar
items.short_description: Step into a magical castle where children can meet princesses, partake in royal dances, and enjoy enchanting storytelling. A dream come true for little royals.
items.address: Outskirts of Atar, Route de Nouakchott, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Enchanted Desert Grove
items.short_description: Explore a whimsical desert-themed forest filled with hidden pathways, sparkling lights, and gentle magical creatures. Discover secret spots and interact with nature's magic.
items.address: Green Zone, Near Atar Oasis, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Tales of the Sands Amphitheater
items.short_description: Enjoy captivating live performances of classic fairy tales and local legends at this open-air amphitheater. Features dazzling costumes and engaging storytellers.
items.address: Atar Cultural Quarter, Rue de la Joie, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Genie's Magical Garden
items.short_description: A vibrant garden themed around Arabian Nights, where children can encounter friendly genies, flying carpets, and mystical creatures. Interactive exhibits encourage imagination.
items.address: Adrar Gardens, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Desert Carousel of Dreams
items.short_description: A classic carousel featuring beautifully decorated animals, offering gentle spins and joyful music. A timeless ride for young children and families.
items.address: Atar Family Park, Avenue du 28 Novembre, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Atar Express Mini Train
items.short_description: Hop aboard a charming mini-train that takes children on a scenic loop around a landscaped garden. A relaxing and delightful ride for all ages.
items.address: Public Gardens of Atar, Rue de la Résistance, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Little Desert Flyer Ferris Wheel
items.short_description: A miniature Ferris wheel offering safe and gentle spins for young children. Provides charming views of the park from a comfortable height.
items.address: Family Entertainment Center, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Oasis Bumper Buggies
items.short_description: Let kids unleash their energy on a fun-filled bumper car track with child-sized buggies. A safe and exciting ride for friendly bumping and laughs.
items.address: Atar Adventureland, Route de l'Espoir, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Sahara Soft Play Zone
items.short_description: A multi-level indoor soft play area with slides, tunnels, and climbing structures. Designed for safe, active play regardless of the weather.
items.address: Atar Mall, Centre Commercial, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Atar Ball Pit Paradise
items.short_description: Dive into a massive ball pit filled with thousands of colorful balls. A joyous and safe environment for children to splash, hide, and play.
items.address: Family Fun Hub, Rue de la Jeunesse, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Climb & Conquer Tower
items.short_description: An impressive indoor climbing structure with varying difficulty levels suitable for different age groups. Challenges physical agility and builds confidence.
items.address: Sport & Recreation Complex, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Bounce House Bliss
items.short_description: Multiple indoor trampolines and bouncy castles where kids can jump, flip, and burn off energy in a supervised and padded environment. Fun for all ages.
items.address: Atar Entertainment Palace, Boulevard de la Culture, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Adrar Junior Funland
items.short_description: A compact theme park featuring gentle rides, playful attractions, and themed zones designed specifically for younger children. Safe and enchanting fun.
items.address: Atar Peripheral Road, Route N1, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Oasis Splash Water Park
items.short_description: A refreshing water park with slides, splash pads, and shallow pools suitable for children of all ages. Perfect for beating the desert heat.
items.address: Near Atar Beach (artificial), Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Mini Mauritania Village
items.short_description: Explore a miniature village showcasing famous Mauritanian landmarks and traditional life scaled down for children. Educational and visually captivating.
items.address: Atar Heritage Park, Route de l'Ancienne Ville, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Dinosaur Desert Safari
items.short_description: Travel back in time to a land of animatronic dinosaurs and prehistoric landscapes. An exciting and educational safari adventure for dinosaur enthusiasts.
items.address: Atar Prehistoric Park, Adrar Mountains foothills, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Atar Discovery Hub
items.short_description: An interactive children's museum where kids can explore various themed zones like a mini-market, construction area, and art studio. Learning through play is key.
items.address: Atar City Center, Avenue de l'Unité, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Little Scientists Lab
items.short_description: Engage in hands-on science experiments and interactive exhibits designed to spark curiosity in STEM. Kids can be geologists, chemists, and astronomers for a day.
items.address: Atar University District, Rue des Savants, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Creative Sands Art Studio
items.short_description: A dedicated art space where children can unleash their creativity through painting, sculpture, and craft activities. Workshops led by local artists are available.
items.address: Artisan Quarter, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Mauritanian Journeys Exhibit
items.short_description: Explore Mauritania's rich history and diverse culture through child-friendly exhibits and storytelling. Hands-on displays showcase local traditions and artifacts.
items.address: Near the Old Ksar, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Atar Petting Paddock
items.short_description: A charming petting zoo where children can safely interact with friendly farm animals like goats, sheep, and rabbits. Educational talks about animal care included.
items.address: Agricultural Zone, Route de Chinguetti, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Mini Desert Wildlife Reserve
items.short_description: A small zoo focusing on local desert wildlife, including fennec foxes, desert hares, and various reptiles. A great opportunity to learn about regional biodiversity.
items.address: Outskirts of Atar, Near Aoujeft Road, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Atar Aviary of Songbirds
items.short_description: Walk through a beautiful aviary filled with a vibrant collection of local and exotic songbirds. Listen to their melodious calls and learn about different species.
items.address: Atar Botanical Gardens, Rue des Oiseaux, Atar, Mauritania

items.name: Critter Corner Encounters
items.short_description: Offers supervised, hands-on encounters with smaller, friendly animals like guinea pigs, tortoises, and chameleons. Learn about their habitats and care directly from keepers.
items.address: Atar Education Park, Avenue de la Connaissance, Atar, Mauritania
